description: Update the event configuration for a particular resource identifier.

parameters.name: Identifier
parameters.description: Resource identifier to opt in for event messaging.

parameters.name: IdentifierType
parameters.description: Identifier type of the particular resource identifier for event configuration.

parameters.name: DeviceRegistrationState
parameters.description: Event configuration for the device registration state event. Sidewalk (dict) --- Device registration state event configuration object for enabling or disabling Sidewalk related event topics. AmazonIdEventTopic (string) --- Denotes whether the Amazon ID event topic is enabled or disabled. WirelessDeviceIdEventTopic (string) --- Denotes whether the wireless device ID device registration state event topic is enabled or disabled.

nested_params.name: Sidewalk
nested_params.description: Device registration state event configuration object for enabling or disabling Sidewalk related event topics.

nested_params.name: AmazonIdEventTopic
nested_params.description: Denotes whether the Amazon ID event topic is enabled or disabled.

nested_params.name: WirelessDeviceIdEventTopic
nested_params.description: Denotes whether the wireless device ID device registration state event topic is enabled or disabled.

parameters.name: Proximity
parameters.description: Event configuration for the proximity event. Sidewalk (dict) --- Proximity event configuration object for enabling or disabling Sidewalk related event topics. AmazonIdEventTopic (string) --- Denotes whether the Amazon ID event topic is enabled or disabled. WirelessDeviceIdEventTopic (string) --- Denotes whether the wireless device ID proximity event topic is enabled or disabled.

nested_params.name: Sidewalk
nested_params.description: Proximity event configuration object for enabling or disabling Sidewalk related event topics.

nested_params.name: AmazonIdEventTopic
nested_params.description: Denotes whether the Amazon ID event topic is enabled or disabled.

nested_params.name: WirelessDeviceIdEventTopic
nested_params.description: Denotes whether the wireless device ID proximity event topic is enabled or disabled.

parameters.name: Join
parameters.description: Event configuration for the join event. LoRaWAN (dict) --- Join event configuration object for enabling or disabling LoRaWAN related event topics. DevEuiEventTopic (string) --- Denotes whether the Dev EUI join event topic is enabled or disabled. WirelessDeviceIdEventTopic (string) --- Denotes whether the wireless device ID join event topic is enabled or disabled.

nested_params.name: LoRaWAN
nested_params.description: Join event configuration object for enabling or disabling LoRaWAN related event topics.

nested_params.name: DevEuiEventTopic
nested_params.description: Denotes whether the Dev EUI join event topic is enabled or disabled.

nested_params.name: WirelessDeviceIdEventTopic
nested_params.description: Denotes whether the wireless device ID join event topic is enabled or disabled.

parameters.name: ConnectionStatus
parameters.description: Event configuration for the connection status event. LoRaWAN (dict) --- Connection status event configuration object for enabling or disabling LoRaWAN related event topics. GatewayEuiEventTopic (string) --- Denotes whether the gateway EUI connection status event topic is enabled or disabled. WirelessGatewayIdEventTopic (string) --- Denotes whether the wireless gateway ID connection status event topic is enabled or disabled.

nested_params.name: LoRaWAN
nested_params.description: Connection status event configuration object for enabling or disabling LoRaWAN related event topics.

nested_params.name: GatewayEuiEventTopic
nested_params.description: Denotes whether the gateway EUI connection status event topic is enabled or disabled.

nested_params.name: WirelessGatewayIdEventTopic
nested_params.description: Denotes whether the wireless gateway ID connection status event topic is enabled or disabled.

parameters.name: MessageDeliveryStatus
parameters.description: Event configuration for the message delivery status event. Sidewalk (dict) --- SidewalkEventNotificationConfigurations object, which is the event configuration object for Sidewalk-related event topics. AmazonIdEventTopic (string) --- Denotes whether the Amazon ID event topic is enabled or disabled. WirelessDeviceIdEventTopic (string) --- Denotes whether the wireless device ID message delivery status event topic is enabled or disabled.

nested_params.name: Sidewalk
nested_params.description: SidewalkEventNotificationConfigurations object, which is the event configuration object for Sidewalk-related event topics.

nested_params.name: AmazonIdEventTopic
nested_params.description: Denotes whether the Amazon ID event topic is enabled or disabled.

nested_params.name: WirelessDeviceIdEventTopic
nested_params.description: Denotes whether the wireless device ID message delivery status event topic is enabled or disabled.
